text: Ornacieux-Balbins is a commune in the Isère department in southeastern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Ornacieux (the seat) and Balbins.Arrêté préfectoral 26 September 2018, p. 236 ==See also== *Communes of the Isère department ==References== *INSEE statistics Category:Communes of Isère Category:States and territories established in 2019
title: Ornacieux-Balbins
